{# errorcheck #} {%% m := map[string]int{} n := map[string]interface{}{} %%} {% macro M(x interface{}) %}{{ x }}{% end macro %} {% m.A = "A" %} // ERROR `cannot use "A" (type untyped string) as type int in assignment` {% m.B.C = "A" %} // ERROR `m.B.C undefined (type int has no field or method C)` {% m.B := "B" %} // ERROR `non-name m.B on left side of :=` {% var m.B int %} // ERROR `unexpected ., expecting type` {% m.A, m.B, m.C = "a", "b", 3 %} // ERROR `cannot use "a" (type untyped string) as type int in assignment` {% n.A = 1 %} {% n.A += 1 %} // ERROR `invalid operation: n[`A`] += 1 (operator + not defined on interface)` {% var a = n.M.A.(int) %} {% var a = n.M.A[5] %} // ERROR `invalid operation: n.M.A[5] (type interface {} does not support indexing)` {{ M(n.M.b) }} {{ M(n.M.b.(int)) }} {% m.X = n.X.Y.Z %} // ERROR `cannot use n.X.Y.Z (type interface {}) as type int in assignment` {% append(m.X, 5) %} // ERROR `first argument to append must be slice; have int`
